mean_en: the work of repairing and cleaning an old building, a painting, etc. so that its condition is as good as it originally was
sentence: The restoration of the temple to its former glory will take a long while.
sentence_trans: 要使这座寺庙恢复往日的辉煌还需要很长时间。
word_etyma: restor恢复 + ation表示行为、情况、状态、过程、结果 → restoration恢复
